resources.string: Mod SystemUI.apk for Xperia. Tap here to configure settings.
Disable black layer on status bar. DO NOT enable on 4.4 or later.
Hide No SIM icon when you have no SIM.
Merge Wi-Fi icon with mobile combo
Merge Wi-Fi icon with mobile signal icon. Wi-Fi icon will be shown on the right side of the mobile signal icon.
Change notif. header button to transparent
Change the number of tiles in a row and unlimited items in quick settings.
Hide notification and quick settings tab.
Move quick settings to notification tab
Move quick settings tiles to notification tab and hide tabs. Use this option if you are using Z2 style SystemUI.
Fix Japanese translation for quick settings.
Change quick settings height. Use this option if you are using Z2 style SystemUI.
Change quicik settings width (for Z3 style)
Change quick settings width. Use this option if you are using Xperia Z3 style SystemUI.
Default width is 270px (90dip for xxhdpi device)
Change battery level for battery charged alert. Check "Play sound when battery is full" in Accessibility settings.
You may need to reboot for changes to take effect.
Specify the number of tiles to show in a row of the quick settings. Enable Change quick settings first.
